item.title: Trump to host German Chancellor Merz
item.description: President Trump will meet with German Chancellor Friedrich Merz next week at the White House.

item.title: Hamas wants amendments to peace plan from U.S.
item.description: Hamas said it wants changes to the ceasefire proposal sent by the U.S. and backed by Israel.

item.title: Ernst draws groans at Iowa town hall after retort on Medicaid cuts, saying 'we all are going to die'
item.description: Republican Sen. Joni Ernst was met with shouts and groans when she said "we all are going to die" as she addressed potential changes to Medicaid eligi...

item.title: 'Prognosis is good': Biden sounds upbeat about cancer treatment
item.description: Former President Joe Biden said people are optimistic about treating his prostate cancer.

item.title: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, in South Carolina remarks, calls on Democrats 'to be a little meaner'
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz sought to energize activists at a Democratic state convention in South Carolina, as the party's 2024 vice presidential nominee...
